amendment.description: To obtain a full accounting of the programs and activities of the Iraqi National Congress.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3388 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 3388 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To obtain a full accounting of the programs and activities of the Iraqi National Congress.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3388 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Leahy.
